description.p: You have spent much of your childhood tiptoeing around hallways, peeking through keyholes, hiding in shadows, and listening in on others conversations.
You might have been working as a spy, gathering secrets and intel for your Patron. Perhaps you were a burglar, or a lookout for a gang. Maybe you just love gossip!

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies:Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, Stealth.

setters.set: Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Thieves’ Tools, Artisan's Tools, Thieves’ Cant

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: Gloomy. Death waits for us all. It is just a matter of time.
Anxious. What if it rains, and I slip in the mud, and break my ankle? AAHH!
Haggler. Hmm, the guy down the street is selling these for 5cp less.
Gormand. This could use a little more salt to balance the flavors. 3 stars.
Rude. Were you born stupid or have you been practicing? Should I use smaller words?
Creepy. Your hair smells even better when you're awake.
Peppy. C'mon guys! Rise and shine! Adventure awaits!
Vain. Do my boots match my gloves? Isn't my hair silky smooth?

select.name: Ideal
select.item: I will see justice done, regardless of circumstances. (Lawful)
Life is meant to be fun! (Chaotic)
I help the poor and downtrodden when I can. (Good)
Power is it's own reward. (Evil)
I am but a leaf on the river of life. (Neutral)
The world just needs more love and understanding. (Good)

select.name: Bond
select.item: My Clan's holy relic was taken. I must retrieve it no matter the cost.
To asure a place of honor in the afterlife, I must accomplish a great feat.
I need a title to wed my beloved.
I escaped a death cult as a child. I pray they never find me.
I was framed for a crime I didn't commit.
I will avenge the murder of my family.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: It's how much? Nevermind. By the way, when do you close?
It wasn't my fault. Honest. Okay, maybe it was.
I am completely focused on what you are saying OOH! A BIRD!
Pranks and practical jokes are the highest form of humor.
I think you mean "whom", not "who". How do you not know this.
I bite my toenails and pick my nose in public.
